original_title: Special Gazette notification declaring public and bank holidays in 2024
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A special gazette notification has been issued announcing government and bank holidays for next year.
Accordingly, the number of government and bank holidays available for next year is 25.
The special gazette notification has been issued under the signature of Prime Minister and Minister of Provincial Councils and Local Government Affairs, Dinesh Gunawardena.
Special Gazette notification declaring public and bank holidays in 2024
